text:
Amusement in Chaos

A bustling room, tension rising.  
He’s ready to laugh uncontrollably.  
Assistant: “Ilya Petrovitch!”  
Head clerk: “Stop! He won’t listen!”  

---  

A smart lady, trembling but smiling.  
She curtsies, waiting for her moment.  
Lady: “No noise or fighting here!”  
Lady: “He came drunk, it’s the truth!”  
Lady: “He broke the piano, very rude!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The scene depicts a chaotic confrontation in an "honourable house" where a drunken man causes a scandal, amusing some while alarming others.
